group.name: allinoneshipping
group.string: This module allows you to offer multiple shipping options to your customers. You can define different shipping rates according to destination, shipping method and the total weight, subtotal or number of items in the order.
Use the tabs at the top of the page to create your shipping zones and to setup rates for each zone.

Warning: Some of your products do not have a weight entered. If you are using this module to setup shipping based on weight, check you have entered weights for all your products and you have the correct weight unit selected within Store Settings.
Example: Shipping is $5 for 0 - 1 kg, $7 for 1 - 2 kg, etc.
Example: Free shipping for orders over $100.
Example: Shipping is $3 for a total quantity up to 5 items, $5 for up to 10 items, etc.
If customer address matches multiple zones
"Use all matching zones" means that if a customer's address matches two or more shipping zones, they will be offered shipping rates from all of the matching zones (excluding 'Rest of World').
"Use first matching zone only" is useful if you have postcode zones and you want to create a country zone that will catch all other postcodes (e.g. 'Rest of UK').
Per item component e.g. $3 multiplied by the total quantity of items in the order
Percentage component e.g. 10% of the order subtotal
Weight component e.g. $0.50 multiplied by the total weight of the order
If you wish to use this shipping module to charge different shipping prices to different addresses, you should setup shipping zones using the Add Shipping Zone tab at the top of the page.
Choose each country by typing here...
Choose each state/province by typing here...
At least one country needs to be selected.
The country must be selected and at least one state/province.
The country must be selected and enter at least one postal code.
Shipping zone sort order successfully updated.
Successfully changed shipping rates: added %1$d, updated %2$d, deleted %3$d.
Failed to change shipping rates: failed to add %1$d, failed to delete %2$d.
At least one shipping rate component needs to be enabled. Flat rate component now enabled.
Successfully upgraded shipping zone data from CubeCart 4 All In One Shipping module. *** IMPORTANT *** Please check that all your zones contain the correct countries and/or states/provinces!
Problems may have occurred when upgrading your shipping zone data. Check the countries and/or states/provinces in all of your shipping zones!

Instructions

  • List your postal codes on separate lines, or separated by commas.
  • For countries with numerical postal codes (e.g. USA, Australia, etc) use a dash (-) to match a number range, e.g. 90210-90214
  • Use an asterisk (*) or a percent sign (%) to match any letters/numbers (any length, zero or more characters) e.g. 902*
  • Use an underscore (_) to match exactly one letter/number e.g. 9021_

Shipping Zone Example (New York City)

10000-10499
11004
11005
11100-11400
11600-11699

Shipping Zone Example (Section of Downtown Toronto)

M4G*, M4H*, M4M*, M4W*, M4X*, M4Y*,
M5A*, M5B*, M5C*, M5E*, M5G*, M5H*, M5J*,
M5K*, M5L*, M5T*, M5V*, M5W*, M5X*
M6J*
M6K*
M6R*

Instructions (USA)

  • List your zipcodes on separate lines, or separated by commas.
  • Use a dash (-) to match a number range, e.g. 90210-90214
  • Use an asterisk (*) or a percent sign (%) to match any letters/numbers (any length, zero or more characters) e.g. 902*
  • Use an underscore (_) to match exactly one letter/number e.g. 9021_

Shipping Zone Example (New York City)

10000-10499
11004
11005
11100-11400
11600-11699

Instructions (Australia)

  • List your postcodes on separate lines, or separated by commas.
  • Use a dash (-) to match a number range, e.g. 2000-2234
  • Use an asterisk (*) or a percent sign (%) to match any letters/numbers (any length, zero or more characters) e.g. 2*
  • Use an underscore (_) to match exactly one letter/number e.g. 200_

Shipping Zone Example (Sydney CBD)

1100-1299
2000-2001
2007
2009

Instructions (Canada)

  • List your postcodes on separate lines, or separated by commas.
  • Use an asterisk (*) or a percent sign (%) to match any letters/numbers (any length, zero or more characters) e.g. M*
  • Use an underscore (_) to match exactly one letter/number e.g. M4B 1B_
  • Note that you cannot use a dash (-) to match a number range since Canadian postcodes contain letters.

Shipping Zone Example (Section of Downtown Toronto)

M4G*, M4H*, M4M*, M4W*, M4X*, M4Y*,
M5A*, M5B*, M5C*, M5E*, M5G*, M5H*, M5J*,
M5K, M5L*, M5T*, M5V*, M5W*, M5X*
M6J*
M6K*
M6R*

Instructions (United Kingdom)

  • List your postcodes on separate lines, or separated by commas.
  • (UK postcodes only) Enter one letter or a pair of letters to match an exact UK postcode area. For example, if you were to setup a postcode zone containing B this would match all customers in Birmingham (e.g. B11 1AA etc) but it WOULDN'T match customers in Northern Ireland or Bristol etc (e.g. BT11 1AA, BS11 1AA, etc)
  • (UK postcodes only) Enter one or two letters immediately followed by one or two numbers to match an exact UK postcode district. For example, if you were to setup a postcode code zone containing KA27 this would match all customers within the Isle of Arran (e.g. KA27 1AA, KA27 2BB, etc).
  • Use an asterisk (*) or a percent sign (%) to match any letters/numbers (any length, zero or more characters)
  • Use an underscore (_) to match exactly one letter/number
  • Note that you cannot use a dash (-) to match a number range since UK postcodes contain letters.

Shipping Zone Example 1 (Scottish Highlands & Islands)

IV
HS
KA27, KA28
KW
PA20, PA21, PA22, PA23, PA24, PA25, PA26, PA27, PA28, PA29,
PA30, PA31, PA33, PA33, PA34, PA35, PA36, PA37, PA38, PA39,
PA40, PA41, PA44, PA44, PA44, PA45, PA46, PA47, PA48, PA49,
PA60, PA61, PA66, PA66, PA66, PA65, PA66, PA67, PA68, PA69,
PA70, PA71, PA77, PA77, PA77, PA75, PA77, PA77, PA78,
PH17, PH18, PH19,
PH20, PH21, PH22, PH23, PH24, PH25, PH26,
PH30, PH31, PH33, PH33, PH34, PH35, PH36, PH37, PH38, PH39,
PH40, PH41, PH44, PH44, PH44,
PH49, PH50
ZE

Shipping Zone Example 2 (Northern Ireland, Isle of Man, Isles of Scilly, Channel Islands)

BT
IM
TR21, TR22, TR23, TR24, TR25
JE
GY
